Title: Prohibits the use of the term 'sex work' and certain variations of such term in the law
Summary: Prohibits the use of the term "sex work" and certain variations of such term in the law or any rule, regulation or resolution.
LawCode: Add Art 2-B ยง69, Gen Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general construction law, in relation to prohibiting the use of the term "sex work" and certain variations thereof in law
